website_summaries.verdict: An excellent deal for those who can take them, as they are easy to swallow, made by a trusted brand, and affordable.
pros: Earns praise for the small, soft gel capsules that are easy to swallow
Doesn't contain preservatives or artificial colors or flavors
A good value, as you get 60 capsules with 5,000 mcg each
cons: Contains soy, which some people are allergic to, and gelatin – so they are not vegetarian

customer_reviews.title: FOR ME, THIS B-12 KEEPS ME GOING
customer_reviews.text: Previously I was taking a 5000 mcg B-12 product that I thought was really super, providing a full day of energy that I frequenty mentioned to friends. As it can happen...I found myself running low and did not find my usual brand on sale. I shopped around and liked what I was reading on Nature Made's label. I am about half way through my first bottle of Nature Made's 5000 mcg B-12 - delighted with the all day energy results, I will continue to take and depend on Nature Made's 5000 mcg B-12 product. I am very satisfield with my new discovery.
customer_reviews.author: CRAYE

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for about a wee know, I have anemia which lead to very low b12. I was always fatigued and just wanting sleep, could barely stay awake at work. After about a week of taking these b12 pills I have noticed a major difference. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S

customer_reviews.title: Stops the pain in my feet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product & it relieves the pain in my feet
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy This time
customer_reviews.text: My order came yesterday.I ordered this product before..And, loved it..!! But, this time I was so disappointed !! I wish you would something in the bottles to make the capsules NOT stick..!! They came all Stuck together in a hard clump..!! It took me over 1 hour pulling them apart and I put them in a bottle with un-cooked rice to keep them dry and apart. Don't your company use "Silica gel packets" or "something" to keep moisture out? I suggest you do.. I decided NOT to use this product after I got them apart.. These " Vitamin B12" capsules might be defective..I threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: There are days I feel like I'm dragging and can barely put 1foot in front ...

customer_reviews.title: I try to get such items as "pure" or "organic" as possible...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive product for free or at reduced price for my REVIEW: The best price I've seen on Amazon. I order these frequently & will continue to do so. When I purchase vitamins, minerals, supplements, soaps, etc., online, I try to get such items as "pure" or "organic" as possible; this product is sold at a good price for the amount included in the bottle, but more importantly, it has a high potency & minimal preservative-type ingredients. It's the healthiest Vitamin B-12 around and it arrived quickly to boot. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Daily energy
customer_reviews.text: My Dr told me to take this daily to help with added energy levels. I will say it works, I will also I feel it’s effectiveness wears off after regular usage. Not sure it’s a product failure or not, maybe just like a lot of things that your body builds a tolerance to but when I initially started taking it I was propelled through the beginning part of my day now I feel it just keeps me from yawning less. Overall still gonna take as it’s natural and not harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Penn

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Nature Made is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got blood test back and I was anemic and deficient in vitamin B12. Within a couple days of taking this I feel better already. I still feel tired, but not exhausted to the point of wanting to sleep all the time. I actually have energy for the first time in months. I have never been disappointed with nature made anything. Will definitely buy again!

This is first time I’ve tried these to combat fatigue, and I think it’s working! Edit: Price has increased so much, that no longer affordable. I don’t continue to buy from a company that does this.

customer_reviews.title: Best supplement for B12!!
customer_reviews.text: I started to notice I had chapped lips and my coworker told me it was because of a B12 deficiency. So instead of paying a billion dollars to go to the doctor, I decided to try these supplements. Within a week, not only did it fix my chapped lips, but I felt like I had more energy and less bloated. The only downfall I have about this is that it freaked me out that the pills were blood red colored. And when I opened the bottle, it smelled a little plasticy and gross.

I had to admit, there are mornings, I just want a glass of orange juice, or some juice, and if I ran out, these gummies, satisfy that craving. I am careful not to use more than two in the morning, but I do really notice a fast boost, a boost I do not get from the swallowed type of B12. I am going back to only using the gummies.

product_meta.title: Nature Made Maximum Strength Vitamin B12 5000 mcg Softgels, 60 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Nature Made Maximum Strength Vitamin B12 provides 5,000 mcg of vitamin B12. Along with other B vitamins, vitamin B12 is important for converting the food you eat into cellular energy.† Maximum Strength Vitamin B12 helps restore healthy levels of B12 in adults with very low levels, as diagnosed by their healthcare professional using appropriate biomarkers.† Made with colors derived from natural sources.

BRAND STORY
By Nature Made
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 60-day supply of Nature Made Maximum Strength Vitamin B12 5000 mcg Softgels, 60 softgels per bottle.
Helps support nervous system function and convert food into cellular energy.
Adults, use only as directed by a physician. Take 1 softgel daily with water and a meal.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
